nodes.name: Survivor's Resolve
nodes.description: Grants a small amount of Life and Energy Shield.

nodes.name: Unyielding Spirit
nodes.description: Increases maximum Life.

nodes.name: Hardened Constitution
nodes.description: Increases maximum Life.

nodes.name: Plated Skin
nodes.description: Increases Armor.

nodes.name: Reinforced Plating
nodes.description: Increases Armor.

nodes.name: Iron Will
nodes.description: Grants a significant amount of Life and Physical Damage Reduction.

nodes.name: Bastion of Steel
nodes.description: Grants a significant amount of Armor and increased Block Chance.

nodes.name: Aetherial Weave
nodes.description: Increases maximum Energy Shield.

nodes.name: Focused Barrier
nodes.description: Increases maximum Energy Shield.

nodes.name: Rapid Recharge
nodes.description: Increases Energy Shield Recharge Rate.

nodes.name: Swift Recovery
nodes.description: Increases Energy Shield Recharge Rate.

nodes.name: Void Barrier
nodes.description: Grants a significant amount of Energy Shield and Energy Shield Recharge Rate.

nodes.name: Overcharged
nodes.description: Energy Shield starts recharging faster.

nodes.name: Brawn
nodes.description: Increases Strength.

nodes.name: Might
nodes.description: Increases Strength.

nodes.name: Savage Strikes
nodes.description: Increases Melee Physical Damage.

nodes.name: Brutal Blows
nodes.description: Increases Melee Physical Damage.

nodes.name: Goliath's Stance
nodes.description: Grants a significant amount of Strength and increased Stun Threshold.

nodes.name: Carnage
nodes.description: Grants a significant amount of Melee Physical Damage and Melee Attack Speed.

nodes.name: Agility
nodes.description: Increases Dexterity.

nodes.name: Precision
nodes.description: Increases Dexterity.

nodes.name: Sharpshooter
nodes.description: Increases Projectile Damage.

nodes.name: Piercing Shots
nodes.description: Increases Projectile Damage.

nodes.name: Fleet-Footed
nodes.description: Grants a significant amount of Dexterity and increased Movement Speed.

nodes.name: Ballistic Mastery
nodes.description: Grants a significant amount of Projectile Damage and Projectile Speed.

nodes.name: Intellect
nodes.description: Increases Intelligence.

nodes.name: Wisdom
nodes.description: Increases Intelligence.

nodes.name: Arcane Acuity
nodes.description: Increases Spell Damage.

nodes.name: Potent Spells
nodes.description: Increases Spell Damage.

nodes.name: Mind Over Matter
nodes.description: Grants a significant amount of Intelligence and a portion of damage is taken from Mana before Life.

nodes.name: Mystic Resonance
nodes.description: Grants a significant amount of Spell Damage and Cast Speed.

nodes.name: Elemental Overload
nodes.description: Your elemental damage can no longer deal Critical Strikes. Instead, if you've dealt a Critical Strike recently, gain 40% more Elemental Damage.

nodes.name: Iron Reflexes
nodes.description: Converts all Evasion Rating to Armor. Dexterity provides no inherent Evasion Rating bonus.

nodes.name: Chaos Inoculation
nodes.description: Maximum Life becomes 1. Grants immunity to Chaos Damage.

nodes.name: Elemental Penetration
nodes.description: Your elemental damage penetrates 10% of enemy Elemental Resistances.

nodes.name: Critical Strike Mastery
nodes.description: Increases Global Critical Strike Chance and Critical Strike Multiplier.

nodes.name: Ailment Mastery
nodes.description: Increases Ailment Effect and Ailment Duration.

nodes.name: Mana Flow
nodes.description: Increases maximum Mana and Mana Regeneration Rate.

nodes.name: Life Leech
nodes.description: Attacks and Spells have 0.5% of Damage Leeched as Life.

nodes.name: Minion Commander
nodes.description: Increases Minion Damage and Minion Life.

nodes.name: Aura Effect
nodes.description: Increases the effect of your Auras.

nodes.name: Charge Generation
nodes.description: Increases maximum Frenzy, Endurance, and Power Charges. Grants a chance to gain a charge on kill.
